3.Name: EVERYTHING SOURDOUGH BREADCRUMBS
3.Method:
Preheat oven to 300F, high fan.
Cut the bread into 3/4" to 1" cubes, including the crust.
Toss sourdough cubes with garlic oil and seasoning
Arrange in single layer on hotel pans.
Toast for 15 minutes.
Stir and toast for an additional 8-10 minutes or until dry and very crisp. Watch carefully. Do not burn.
Remove from oven and allow to cool until room temperature.
Pulse in batches using the Robot Coupe. Breadcrumbs should have a mixture of fine to coarse pieces, but no large chunks.
Store breadcrumbs in a cambro with a desiccant pack.
3.Notes: ALLERGEN : ALLUIM, BLACK PEPPER, GLUTEN, WHEAT
